description.narrative: Children on the move are protected from violence, exploitation and abuse and are able to access services and exercise their rights,which contributes to Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: New Element

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Children on the move are protected from violence, exploitation and abuse and are able to access services and exercise their rights

description.narrative: Through the child protection program, over 24,000 Venezuelan children and adolescents living in and out of shelters accessed psycho-social support (2019 HAC target: 14,000). In June, an innovative approach to optimize resources and improve services was devised, merging Temporary Learning Centers (TLS) and Child Friendly Spaces (CFS) into 23 Súper Panas across Roraima and Manaus States. With an unforeseen drastic increase of unaccompanied and separated children (UASC), extensive efforts were made to lead interagency processes to redress the fragmented and inadequate response (incl. referrals development), and to secure dedicated case management for UASC and introduce alternative care arrangements. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:06/02/2020

title.narrative: Number of children without parental or family care provided with appropriate alternative care arrangements [COVIDSitRep]
Percentage of UNICEF-targeted girls and boys in humanitarian situations provided with psychosocial support, including access to child friendly spaces with intersectoral programming interventions
